revised_title: Experiments and Observations on the Toxicity of Vegetable Poisons
tldr: The author investigates the effects of various vegetable poisons on the animal system, focusing on internal and external applications. Experiments with alcohol reveal that it causes delirium and death by acting on the brain, while the essential oil of bitter almonds induces convulsions and death. The study highlights the importance of understanding the mechanisms of poison action and potential ways to prevent fatal consequences.
